message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $100, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $105?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $102?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $102, but I'm still a bit below my target price. I'm willing to compromise further. How about we try $108?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
